1: <pb/><t>Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová. Ex chekbej Cham bitnanek bay.</t>
2: <pb/><t>Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Cham tinani', c'al yet yajtok tu'.</t>
3: <t>Bitnelayokab Cham bay chi ajol c'u, c'al bay chi toj c'u.</t>
4: <t>A Jehová ayay yiban mimek conoblak. A is tzekekial Cham ayajtok yiban satcan.</t>
5: <pb/><t>C'am mactxel lajan yetok Jehová co Diosal. Ayic' Cham bay satcan, Yajaw yayji yin masanil,</t>
6: <t>cax chi yilon aytek satcan c'al tx'otx' tx'otx' ti'.</t>
7: <t>A Cham chi ion aj wan eb meba' ayay sat tx'otx', axa eb ayoc yin majilal, chi yi can eltek Cham yalan mebil,</t>
8: <t>yet watx' chi ay chotan eb xol yet animail ay yelapnok yul is conobal.</t>
9: <t>Axa ix ix tol man uniwomixok, chi yak' Cham tzaloj c'ul yoc yin txutxejal, c'al yayji ec' ix bay is yatut. <pb/>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová!</t>
